page.title: 04Our School
page.content: Our school is at the bottom of Adare Street it is called Fronwen Primary School. There are three yards and two shelters underneath the classrooms. There are two entrances where one gate leads to the infants yard and the other leads to the juniors yard. There are seven on the staff including the headmaster and three of them are male and the others are female. There are 149 children in the school and 77 are boys and 72 are girls. The age range is from 4 to 11. There are ten classrooms but two of them are not used. We have a hall which is used as a dining room. The school dinners are cooked in another school and brought to the school in containers. We have a special class called the "Oppurtunity class" and on some days a teacher comes to give some children extra help with their reading.
